entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2010/05. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-H24: TÁRKI Omnibus 2010/05. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population. data sheet. Version: 2013-01-09

entry.dcterms:description: The blocks of the TÁRKI 2010/04. omnibus survey: 1; Political attitude. 2; Attitudes towards the political roles of women in Hungary 3; Attitude toward the abolition of the cars environmental protection card
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political ideology
gender and gender roles
transport, travel (and mobility)
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
